title: Seafood Korma

ingredients.content: 1 fresh green chilli, deseeded, sliced for garnish
15 g fresh root ginger, sliced in rounds (2 mm)
100 g cod fillet, skinless, boneless, sliced (2 cm)
100 g whole squid, medium, tube only, sliced and scored

preparations.content: Place fresh coriander in mixing bowl and chop <b>3 sec/speed 8<b>. Transfer to a bowl and set aside.
Place onions, tomatoes, 30 g oil, ginger and garlic in mixing bowl then chop <b>10 sec/speed 8<b>.
Add cumin, ground coriander, chilli powder, cloves and cardamom pods then sauté <b>5 min/100°C/speed <b>.
Add ground almonds, coconut milk, cream, salt and pepper then simmer <b>8 min/98°C/speed 1<b>. Meanwhile heat remaining 30 g oil and butter in a frying pan then sauté the seafood in batches to seal.
Add sealed seafood and juices  to mixing bowl then continue to simmer <b>3 min/98°C//speed <b> until the seafood is cooked. Serve garnished with reserved chopped coriander.

hintsAndTricks: Serve with sliced chillis and pilau rice.
Use mussels or scallops instead of cod.
